info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 8:07PM CDT until June 13 at 7:21AM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas...
Salado Creek At at Loop 13 affecting Bexar County.
San Antonio River Near Elmendorf affecting Bexar and Wilson Counties.
San Antonio River near Floresville affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties.
Medina River At Hwy 281 affecting Bexar County.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
Leon Creek At I-35S near San Antonio affecting Bexar County.
Cibolo Creek at Sutherland Springs affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties.
Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County.
Medina River at Somerset affecting Bexar County.
* WHAT...Action stage is forecast.
* WHERE...Medina River at Somerset.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water reaches slab of Knights of Columbus business office at Medina River and Pearsall Road upstream near Von Ormy.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 15.5 feet late tonight. It will then fall to 5.8 feet late Saturday morning. It will rise to 5.9 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.3 feet on 10/14/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING
